head.title: ARE VIEWERS ENTITLED TO GAMES ON FREE TV?

hedline.hl1: ARE VIEWERS ENTITLED TO GAMES ON FREE TV?

block.p: LEAD: George Steinbrenner must think all Yankee fans are fools, after he ''sold out'' on us once again. Well, I will never go to the Stadium again, and I feel the only recourse we fans have is to pool together and boycott games. When Mr. Steinbrenner sees those picket lines, maybe, just maybe he'll get the message.
